name: BTC_A1
description: BTC_A1 is a next-generation decentralized BEP20 token on Binance Smart Chain, designed with Bitcoin-level security and a fixed total supply. Our mission is to create a secure, transparent, and community-driven token that empowers holders and supports long-term growth.
extended_description:
Key Features:
- Decentralized governance
- Fixed total supply: 21,000,000 BTC_A1
- Secure and immutable smart contract
- Active community support

Stay connected and get the latest updates via our official channels:
Telegram: https://t.me/btc_a1_official
GitHub: https://github.com/khatuSP/btc-a1-website
